resources.string: Class Calendar is an application that helps teachers who teach private classes how to manage their classes in terms of the date, time and if the class has already been paid

" In the initial screen has a main button that has the functionality to add new classes, however it is necessary to have students and plans registered. To register they must access the menu found in the icon with three dots in the upper right, there is access to student management and plans."

" In the student and plan management screens, the system works the same way, the fields must be filled for data insertion, a list is incremented below and when you click on an item, the data will appear in the fields and you can edit them, to confirm the edit you need to click the button again which will now work as an embedding. In the top right there is an icon with the image of a garbage, it has the function to delete an item from the list when it is selected."

" Returning to the home screen, you will have a list with items below the button to enter new classes, this list will display the dates with marked classes. Clicking on a date will show the classes relating the student's name to the class time. If you click on one of these classes, the details of the classes will be displayed, where each field can be changed. To upgrade you need to select the update button and to delete you only need to select the trash icon in the upper right."
Do you really want to delete?
